Utterance: So abar jokhon tumi tomar stress, chinta, o ashonka niye emotional inventory nebe, ebong scale korecho, tumi nijeke kothay rakhte chao?

Ami mane kori sambhabota tinatira kachakachi ekhono aro aashabadi ebong dharaner anubhuti anubhaba karachi na, ami anumana kori ye eti ekati bara chuktira cheye kichuta kama mane hacche yakhana ami esechilam.
Tobe kichu chinta gulo to, onno rokom theke komiye nea holo mone hoy, taina?
Tai to. Thala te thakbe. Three thekeo besi dhukche, kintu age thekeo kom. Aar peak er moto obostha thekeo beshi noy.
Mone aache, agele tumi ei self-talk-ta shokale, automatik ghadi te apply korte paro, ekta plan banate gele?
Haan, mone hoy eta bhalo hobe, karon shokale mone hobe ei kaj ta korte hobe.

Aache besh kichu jaygaye ami tumader sathe jete chai. Amra CBT niye kotha bolbo aar eta tomader obosthay kivabe jorito hocche ta niye. Ami chao, ami ek sathe beshi kichu bojhai na, karon ak sathe beshi kichu dite bhalo na. Tai amar kichu boro boro kotha bolte chao na. Okhanei kichu homework debo, karon sei gulo boro mahatwo pachche. Thik achhe? Aar ekta jinish hocche, tumi chirokal prottekta din kbe ei automatic gulo mone pore, eta bujhle, tar age tumi ki mone korechile seta ghuchiye anbo. Haan. Eta khub asan kaj noi, shuru te sudhu obosthay mone rakhte chesta koro. Jodi korte pao, seta likhte try koro, jodi safe thake. Jodi na korte pao, thik achhe. Tai bhabte hobe, somoy kete, jodi ajke tomake mone hoi beshi chinta hoyeche. Tumi tokhono bhabte thako, tarpor mone hoi, tumi keu likhte paro. Tarpor je mone hoi, seta likhte hobe. Aar seta ki, seta na dekhte likhe dile hobe, bhalo hoe. Tumi tarpor tai korte paro. Ba na, tai. Asha kori ei sob kotha te bhalo bojha hoyeche. Kichu prosner aache to?
Thik ache. Erpor ki korbo? Tai ki, sticky note-e likhe pora dorkar naki? Journal-e rakhar dorkar naki?

Bhalo prosner. Ami bolbo, journal-e rakho, okhane likho, aar seta amader sathe bring koro. Tumi je shomoy comfortable feel koro, tumi tai korte paro. Aar ami chaichi je amra ekta inventory banabo, adaptive responses er. Ei to bujhle na? Tui kichu janle bujho, kichu prosner ache to?
Na, mane, mone hoy besh kichu shikhano hoyeche. Shokale jokhon kaj koro, aar din bhar mone pore onno kichu mone pore tokhono likho, aar aar kichu, ami korte parbo.

Mone hoi, etai shuru korar jonno bhalo. Aar amra next week er jonno akta somoy set korte ja bole toiri korbo. Okhane thamte hobe. Tui kemon aachis eta bujhlaam, aar ami toiri korlam. Aar ami dekhi, ekhon thekeo tomar shomoy gulor sathe tumi kibhabe cope koro, amra shikhbo. Ei shomoye tomar kaaj hocche tomar jibone jekhane tomar power ache, seta amra dekhte chi. Ei jonne ami chao tomar aagamir kajgulo te tomake tokhono prepared korte paro. Eta to bujhecho, tomake aajke amar mone hoiyeche ki?

Haan, ami mone hoi, ami onek kore ortho karar jonno kaj korechi. Tai mone hoy, orthei ami nijeo ke help korte parbo. Aar ami biswas kori, jodi ami kaj ta kori, tahole bhobishyote, jabar samoy amar stress barbe, tobe ami ektu bhalo korte parbo.

Haan, tai ami asha kori je tumi notun challenge gulo teo amuk kore jabe, karon jibon e oi gulo asbe. Aar ami chao je tomar jonno eibhabei prepared thak. Tui ekhon jokhon eto chinta korchis, ami jani je tomar thekeo onek shakti ache. Mone rakho, tomake etao parar. Aar ete shesh. Jodi tomar jonno bhalo thakle to bhalo. Okhane thakbe, seta niye amra next week er jonno appointment tule felbo.
